top.title: Epstein email says Andrew had photo taken with Virginia Giuffre
top.summary: The message sent by Epstein reads: "Yes she [Giuffre] was on my plane and yes she had her picture taken with Andrew"

top.title: What we know about new Epstein emails that mention Trump
top.summary: In emails released by Democrats, Epstein says Trump "knew about the girls". The White House says they are an attempt to "smear" the president.

top.title: Germany agrees new military service plan to boost troop numbers
top.summary: The new military service plan will mandate all 18-year-old men to fill out a questionnaire on their suitability to serve.

top.title: PC gaming giant Valve unveils new console to rival Xbox and PlayStation
top.summary: The Steam Machine is a console designed to allow gamers to play PC games on their TV.

top.title: £220 'for a cut-up sock' - Apple's new iPhone Pocket ridiculed online
top.summary: Many took aim at the high price online, while others made fun of its striking likeness to a piece of footwear.

top.title: Danish man given suspended sentence for sharing nude film scenes on Reddit
top.summary: Police said the man shared 347 clips of naked actors on the social media site, which were viewed 4.2 million times.
